description: Detects when a person begins to lose trust in their own capacity to choose, speak, or act—due to fear, social pressure, or trauma. Flags collapse of personal agency.

variables.D(t): Deferral signals (e.g. excessive 'you tell me', avoidance of decisions)
variables.A(t): Authority pressure (fear of judgment, learned helplessness)

response: You matter. Even when it’s hard. You’re allowed to act, speak, and choose. Let’s take back one small action—your way.
